Name: Category
Description: Category Games: Correctly pick the items that do or do not belong in a given category.

Games.Name: Walmart Categories
Games.Description: Walmart Categories: in this category game you learn about what items belong in the different departments in Walmart.

Games.Name: Learn About Food Groups
Games.Description: Learn About Food Groups: in this game you can learn about the different food groups, such as fruits, vegetables, breads, meats, and dairy.
